attributes.action: To review price  rise council  tax
attributes.additional_details: The banding has to be done on what a person can afford not forced to pay by a law that can't be challenged. I propose a higher band for higher earners an sms a lower band for lower earner. And a say from the public on where the money Is spent
attributes.background: Council tax is rising and will rise faster than inflation.People working can face up to a 6% hike.most people have not had a pay rise to run in line with this. I want a reform on how much theworking class pay on what they earn.if one person earns 12.000 and the other  50.000 they pay same banding
